review_data.title: Great Japanese food
review_data.content: Had some lunch at this small restaurant. Miso soup was very tasty, gyoza were amazing. Nice food and good service! Will come again to try their Sushi.

review_data.title: Tasty&Cosy dinner
review_data.content: Your meal will be cooked real time and carefully in front of you. Super tasty dinner! Cosy place to enjoy a friends’ night out

review_data.title: Délicieux
review_data.content: Nous avons commandé des plats à l'emporter étant donné la situation sanitaire. Livraison rapide, soupes bien emballées, les plats étaient...More

review_data.title: Excellent
review_data.content: A small cosy restaurant with excellent food. Many people come for take away. The staff is really friendly.

review_data.title: Sehr schön und lecker
review_data.content: sehr authentisches japanisches Essen Nette Bedienung gemütliche Einrichtung gutes Preis-leistungs-Verhältnis

review_data.title: One of the best places to get quality sushi
review_data.content: The sushi is perfect. The texture and flavor of the rice is perfect. The proportion of rice to fish is perfect. The rolls that are offered are delicious. It is not dine-in but there are several places where you can find a seat. Down to...More

review_data.title: super!
review_data.content: online bestellt - schnell geliefert, sieht top aus und schmeckt auch so. für alle etwas dabei. kann ich nur empfehlen!

review_data.title: Super Suppe und Sushi
review_data.content: Sushi wird frisch vor Ort zubereitet und es hat eine gute Auswahl an Platten. Ausserdem gibt es Udon und Miso...More

review_data.title: Best Sushi Take-Away shop in town
review_data.content: Tokyo Tapas sushi mix is excellent - freshly made and all the fish is always top quality! Furthermore all the Japanese ladies working there are very charming and service is very quick. I also like a good selection of sake wines. The prices considering the...More

review_data.title: Excellent Sushi takeaway
review_data.content: I often get Sushi for lunch here. Excellent and very fresh Sushi. Authentic and very polite employees.

review_data.title: My favorite lunch place im Zürich
review_data.content: Eat here nearly every day. Authentic Udon for 9 CHF is a steal in Zürich. Great fresh Sushi that beats several places I've eaten across Japan. And most wonderful owner who takes great care and pride in the small shop.

review_data.title: Excellent Japanese Food on the Go
review_data.content: This is more of a take away place. Food is very nice and service is quick. Best is mix sushi take away.

review_data.title: Love the Udon Soup
review_data.content: Maybe not the best Udon soup I ever had, but really good value for money in Zurich. Great authentic little place for take away.

review_data.title: Good standard for a take-out place
review_data.content: This is not a restaurant but a small take-out place with simple Japanese food, like Suishi, Soba and Udon noodles and some rice with fish.They are made fresh on the spot. I have tried a couple of their menus. The suishi is really quite good....More
